titleStmt.title: Certaine short prayers and meditations vpon the Lords prayer and the Ten commandements With other particular prayers for seuerall purposes. Written by the right worshipfull Sir Iames Perrott Knight.
Certaine short prayers and meditations upon the Lords prayer and the Ten commandments.
titleStmt.author: Perrott, James, Sir, 1571-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes for Robert Svvayne, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible, at Britaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Meditations vpon the Lords prayer.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible, at Britaines Burse
